snippet: Villyan Bijev, who was born in Bulgaria but grew up in California, is one of an increasing number of young American players to sign with a top European club -- in his case Liverpool of England's Premier League.
abstract: Villyan Bijev, who was born in Bulgaria but grew up in California, is one of an increasing number of young American players to sign with a top European club -- in his case Liverpool of England's Premier League.
lead_paragraph: As the week-long United States under-20 camp ended last Sunday in Ft. Lauderdale, Fla., one of the players who is shaping up to be an important part of the team in months ahead is the forward Villyan Bijev.

headline.main: For Villyan Bijev, Destination Liverpool, With a Stop in Düsseldorf
